msbt.message: Have you had a chance to meet that character yet?Just wonderin' if you knew what they're like, .
That reminds me You heard the latest about ?
You hear what got up to the other day?
Can't remember the last time I saw around hereIf you get a chance, tell 'em to drop by and say "Hey," .
Ohâ€”I saw today.Dunno what they were up to exactly, but they were doin' it with a lotta pep in their step, .
I saw yesterday.Looked busy though, so I tried not to get in their way, .
Haven't seen that character around lately.Wonder why not? Hope they're havin' fun wherever they are, .
So, was just here from
Last time I saw from
Seems like it's been a real long while since dropped by.Guess they must be busy with their life back on .Anyway, here's hopin' we see 'em again soon, !
You're a friend of from ?Nice of 'em to come all the way here to visit. Reckon the two of you must be good buddies, .
Hey, ain't you friends with that who was here the other day? Maybe you know why they haven't visited us from in a while,
So, that character came all the way here to spend time with you, ? Don't reckon I know anyone from who might do the same for me
Been a while since I've seen that around here.Wonder what's kept 'em so busy back on ?
Sounds like they were busy around here for hours. Reckon they must've been havin' fun, .What they got up to, I couldn't say. I'll have to remember to ask 'em, next time we cross paths.
Rumor has it that they nearly fished our waters empty, !Wonder if they'd be willin' to give an old cuss a few anglin' pointers Probably not for free, huh?
Heard tell they caught themselves a whole mess of bugs, .Just hope they left a few critters for the rest of us to catch. It sure would bug me if they didn't. Gahaha!
I hear they combed our seashore nearly clean of shells! Wonder why they needed so many, I pick up my share of shells if they catch my eye, but never THAT many.
Heard they really got into clammin' along the shore here, .Wonder if they're planning to use all them clams for bait, or if they're fixin' to make some tasty chowder?
Keep hearin' tales of their slingshot skills. Sounds like they were droppin' balloons left and right, ! How'd our peaceful island get turned into a wild-west shootin' gallery?
Apparently they were seen wishin' up a storm on some shootin' starsSure hope they thought to use one to wish me luck, . Every little bit helps!
I heard they were shaking trees all over the island, so I did my best to keep my distance, .Didn't want to be anywhere nearby when they shook loose a wasp nest
I heard they took an axe to a lot of our trees and started wonderin' what they needed all the wood for. Just wanna know if I should be on the lookout for some new wooden work of art is all, .
Rumor is that they're the one who was choppin' down trees all over the island, Suppose they might've been doin' it for stress relief? If that's what it was all about, they must be relaxed now.
I hear they were busy plantin' stuff all over our island, .Seein' as they worked so hard to beautify our island, we should at least try to water the flowers.
Heard they spent a lot of time waterin' our flowers for us. Nice gesture, .
Must've been feelin' extra dramatic, 'cause everyone says they were chewin' some serious scenery. Nothin' wrong with reactin' to stuff. Maybe just don't get carried away, .
Apparently they've been jettin' back and forth between here and someplace else, . Wonder what that's all about?
They had a lot of friends visitin' here from off-island. Never seen our airport so busy, ! Kinda nice to be playin' host to so many travelers, though. Hope they had themselves a good time here!
They must've been bitten hard by the DIY bug. Heard they were super busy craftin' up a storm, ! Wonder what they made
Heard they ended up with a whole mess of busted tools, .Probably a sign they were workin' too hard, if you ask me.
Guess they were holed up indoors the whole time. Explains why I never ran into 'em, It's a wonder they didn't go stir crazy in there. Pretty sure I would.
Heard they spent a bunch of time doin' stuff outdoors, . Good for them, I say! Never a bad idea to get out in the fresh air. Who wants to be cooped up at home all the time? Not this guy.
There's a rumor that they were sneakin' around and diggin' pits all over the place, . A word to the wise: Watch where you're steppin' around here.
Rumor is they kept fallin' into pits. Maybe I ain't one to talk, but how clumsy can you be, ? Hope they've climbed out by now
Heard they were busy redecoratin'. Explains all the loud bangs and crashes comin' from their place. At least I hope it does, .
Heard they were busy designin' somethin' or other on their phone for a good long while, .Or whatever it is you kiddos are always fussin' with on them things.
Good thing I had some free time, 'cause they were in the mood to chat. Talked my ears off, ! Not that I'm complainin', mind you. Feel free to talk at me whenever.
Heard they spent a while chattin' to , .Not that I'm jealous or nothin'
Everyone's still buzzin' about how they stopped to chat with dang near all of us around here, . Wish I could ever be that social
Apparently they got themselves stung by an angry swarm of wasps.Sounds like they were goin' around shakin' trees, and that came back to bite 'em. Or sting em, !
They messed with the wrong wasps and got themselves stung but good. Must be plenty sore, . Watch out if you're shakin' trees.
Heard a rumor they dug up a great big pile of fossils, .No wisecracks about how they should throw me on the pile, OK?
I couldn't figure out why I kept on hearin' loud clangs. Guess I heard them hittin' rocks with their shovel. Must've been tryin' to break loose somethin' useful, .
Rumor is they were seen buryin' perfectly good Bells, . Can you imagine?Must be a better way to set aside Bells. I'd be worried about forgettin' where I buried 'em, if it was me.
Heard they picked the island nearly clean of , !Hope they left a few around for us. I like a nice for breakfast
I heard they were messin' with their phone every time anyone saw 'em.You kiddos can't ever seem to put down your phones, .
Apparently they couldn't seem to stop playin' with their dang phone.Can't be good for their eyes, starin' at that little screen, .
Seems they were doin' a lot of road buildin' around here, .Nice thing to do for the community! I try to do my part by patrollin' our island at night for troublemakers.
Heard they dug out a whole bunch of new waterways, .Wish I had that kind of energy. Just hearin' about all their work made me want to take a nap.
I hear they were busy buildin' cliffs all over the place, Seen any new ones around?
Sounds like they were doin' some serious fence buildin', .Didn't realize that character was so handy
I heard they were shufflin' furniture all around outdoors. Not sure what to make of that,
Rumor is they've managed to rack up a whole mess of miles, .I'd be lyin' if I said I ain't envious. Haven't managed to accumulate much of anythin', myself
Rumor is they paid back their loan to Tom Nook already! Free and clear. Must be nice, Tom Nook must be gratified too. Hope I can find out how that feels for myself one of these days.
Sounds like they did a lot of business at Nook's Cranny, .Wonder what they were up to thereâ€”buyin', sellin', or both?
Guess they were the one who chose our island tune the other day. Did you notice, ? They've got good taste!
Heard they were the one who changed the flag flyin' outside of Resident Services the other day. Might've missed the change, except I'm the type who pays attention to that sort of thing, .
Heard a crazy story sayin' they got a magic wand that lets 'em change outfits and stuff, .
Heard they were showin' off their vaulting pole skills, jumpin' to and fro like it was nothin', !
Rumor is they were buyin' up turnips like they were goin' out of style.Waitâ€”are they? You'd tell me if they were, right? I ain't exactly a savvy stalk-market investor, .
I heard they sold all their turnips at just the right time to clear a nice, tidy profit, !How come I can't manage to do that?
They were overheard chattin' away at someone around here, . Wait, was that somebody you?<10_4 /> 'Cause if it was, you sure got an earful!
Everybody's talkin' about how they went on a weedin' tear around here the other day, . If I tried to pull that many weeds up, you better bet that my back would be sore as all get-out the next day
I hear tell they changed up their hairstyle. Have you seen 'em yourself, ?
Heard they switched up their look. Just hope I recognize 'em next time I run into 'em, .
Sounds like they were a regular shutterbug, snappin' zillions of photos around here, . If they'd asked, I would've been happy to pose for a few

Word was they got real deep into diving. Must've been somethin' to it, 'cause they dragged up quite a haul!To think that stuff was down there all along Makes one wonder what else we're missin' out on, .
